title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 103.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 103.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purposes of this Part are to: (a) adopt the valuation manual and exercise the superintendent's authority, pursuant to Insurance Law section 4217(g), to deviate, through regulation, from the reserve standards, valuation methods, assumptions, and related requirements in the valuation manual; and
(b) prescribe rules for valuing statutory reserves subject to the requirements of the valuation manual. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
